message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $115. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
I understand your position, Bob, but $100 is below my minimum. How about we meet in the middle at $107?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
